content.p: Introduced in early 2019, the Supervisory Research Seminar Series focuses on our ongoing efforts to better support Research supervisors (especially Early Career Researchers who are new to PhD supervision). This seminar series aim to support a culture of the discussion of research supervision purpose and practice across the Institution as well as inform PhD supervisors on a wide range of supervision topics. The topics covered present PhD supervisors with an opportunity to gain more advice and practice-sharing from experienced PhD supervisors. Examples topics covered so far: Kindly sign up for the above-mentioned courses by logging into Moodle using your university credentials. email:graduateschool@nottingham.edu.my
